subtitle: Cottage cheese and smoked salmon or trout is used in this recipe.

method.text: In a bowl, mix together the cottage cheese, lemon rind and juice and seasoning.
Divide the filling between the potatoes.
Cut each slice of fish in two and fold over slightly. Arrange on top of the cottage cheese. Garnish with lemon slices and dill. Season before serving.

title: Black Russian jacket potato filler
